title: AnonymizationSettingsResponse
description: Response payload representing the stored request anonymization configuration.

enabled.description: Whether anonymization of requests is enabled.

retentionDays.description: Number of days to retain request data before it becomes eligible for anonymization.

fields.description: List of request fields that will be anonymized when the policy triggers.

items.description: A field name from the request record to anonymize.

createdDate.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the record was created.

createdByUserId.description: UUID of the user who created the record.

updatedDate.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the record was last updated.

updatedByUserId.description: UUID of the user who last updated the record.
